title: 17-year-old shot in Park Hill neighborhood
content:
LOUISVILLE, KY (WAVE) – A 17-year-old was shot multiple times in the Park Hill neighborhood Wednesday, according to Louisville Metro police.
The shooting was reported in the 1300 block of Cypress Street around 6:10 p.m.
MORE FROM WAVE3.COM

+ Man facing organized crime charge related to thefts of vehicles
+ Murder victim’s mother reacts to alleged killer’s arrest
LMPD spokesman Dwight Mitchell said the victim was taken to University of Louisville Hospital with non life-threatening injuries.
No suspect information has been released.
The LMPD Major Crimes Unit is investigating the case. Anyone with information is asked to call the anonymous police tip line at (502) 574-LMPD.
